item.description: <p>Jorjina Odisho, 51, was at a doctor&#x27;s appointment in Niddrie when an out-of-control car ploughed into the clinic, killing one man and leaving her with serious injuries.</p>

item.title: 'Punishment for something we didn't create': Australia's social media ban started today. Teens say it's alread
item.description: <p>Of the five teens nine.com.au ﻿﻿spoke to, only one had lost access to a single social media platform.</p>

item.title: Anxiously waiting your ATAR? Here is a state-by-state guide on how to access your results
item.description: <p>O﻿ne state will release results as soon as tomorrow, with the rest of the country to follow in the coming days.</p>

item.title: Man charged after allegedly running over pregnant partner in horrific domestic violence attack
item.description: <p>The woman was allegedly struck in the face with a glass vase at a home in Narellan Vale, before she tried to leave the property and was allegedly run over by a Mazda sedan.</p>

item.title: Officers who monitor criminals on home detention walk off the job
item.description: <p>Officers keeping watch over more than 1500 criminals on home detention in South Australia have walked off the job.</p>

item.title: Wellness influencer Stacey Warnecke died from severe blood loss after home 'free birth', court told
item.description: <p>Stacey Warnecke died from severe blood loss after suffering a postpartum haemorrhage in the hours after having a free birth at home, a court has been told.</p>

item.title: Panda Mart banned from trading for 72 hours after hundreds of illegal items found on shelves
item.description: <p>The discount shop, which opened in Melbourne earlier this year,﻿ will remain closed for 72 hours from 9am today while a full compliance inspection takes place.</p>

item.title: Woman details shocking harassment by suspected serial creep
item.description: <p>A young woman has detailed her shocking encounter with a suspected serial creep in a Woolworths in Adelaide&#x27;s northern suburbs.</p>

item.title: 'She holds our family together': Dad remembers young woman killed when pole fell on car
item.description: <p>Sayyida ﻿Nafeesa Zulfikar, 21, was driving on Melbourne&#x27;s Hume Freeway in Somerton yesterday morning when a pole fell on her silver Honda.</p>

item.title: The widening rift between Trump and Europe is a gift to Putin
item.description: <p>H﻿e&#x27;s also taken a potshot at an old sparring partner, and it&#x27;s all playing into the Kremlin&#x27;s hands.</p>

item.title: Federal politicians billed taxpayers $1.1 million for their family's travel
item.description: <p>The Tourism Minister ironically racked up the highest receipts.</p>

item.title: Aussie kids are officially booted from social media today. What now?
item.description: <p>The government is watching how children behave now that the world-first ban is in effect.</p>

item.title: 'What's right and what's wrong?': Man's predicament after Queensland street brawl
item.description: <p>An 18th birthday party has turned into pandemonium after men in balaclavas descended on a family barbecue in Queensland.</p>

item.title: Stalker's obsession with radio host Jackie O explained
item.description: <p>David Gourlay inundated the broadcaster with up to 2000 direct messages on Instagram over five months.</p>
